messages.subject: Colorado trip
messages.msgSnippet: Next week we re heading to Denver CO. We ll be in Denver tuesday thru sunday and then going to Boulder and up into the mountains. We would love to go to a park
messages.messageBody:
Next week we're heading to Denver CO. We'll be in
Denver tuesday thru sunday and then going to Boulder
and up into the mountains. We would love to go to a
park day while there or meet other unschoolers. I have
2 kids - 8 year old girl and 5 yr old boy.

I searched on the web and found several homeschooling
organizations and one even with a park day, but the
web-site was set up such that you had to become a
member and pay your dues before you could get
information about the park day.

So if you'd like to meet us or have helpful
information about park day, what to see in Denver etc,
contact me off-list at m_kher@...

Thanks
Manisha







____________________________________________________________________________________
